    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, method automatically called when the fxml is loaded

    • setGui

      public void setGui​(GUI gui)
      Method called by the main GUI in order to give the gui controller a reference of itself
      Parameters:
      gui - the Gui controlled by this controller

    • skipButtonPressed

      public void skipButtonPressed()
      Method that updates the image of the button pressed, and call the next GUI command based on the phase of the turn played

    • skipButtonReleased

      public void skipButtonReleased()
      Method that updates the image of the button pressed

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(int index, int level)
      Given a cell index and a level ,this method sets the corresponding level height on the corresponding gridPane cell
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the cell to set the level of
      level - the level displayed on the given cell after the method call

    • setDome

      public void setDome​(int index)
      Method that sets the dome on the cell index given
      Parameters:
      index - cell where the dome needs to be add

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(int index, java.lang.String url)
      Method that sets the worker on the cell index given
      Parameters:
      index - cell where the worker needs to be add
      url - indicate the color of the worker (different color for each player)

    • setCandidate

      public void setCandidate​(int index)
      Method that sets the given cell index in a candidate cell highlighted
      Parameters:
      index - cell where the candidate ring needs to be add

    • setPlacingWorkersBoard

      public void setPlacingWorkersBoard()

    • setPlayer1Panel

      public void setPlayer1Panel​(java.lang.String god, java.lang.String nickname, boolean playingPlayer, boolean deadPlayer, java.lang.String url_icon)
      Method that set the Player 1 Pane with every detail about it
      Parameters:
      god - god card owned by the player 1
      nickname - nickname of the player 1
      playingPlayer - indicate if the player 1 is the one that is playing the turn
      deadPlayer - indicate if the player 1 is dead or is not playing anymore
      url_icon - Id that distinguishes each workers by his color (different for each player)

    • setPlayer2Panel

      public void setPlayer2Panel​(java.lang.String god, java.lang.String nickname, boolean playingPlayer, boolean deadPlayer, java.lang.String url_icon)
      Method that set the Player 2 Pane with every detail about it
      Parameters:
      god - god card owned by the player 2
      nickname - nickname of the player 2
      playingPlayer - indicate if the player 2 is the one that is playing the turn
      deadPlayer - indicate if the player 2 is dead or is not playing anymore
      url_icon - Id that distinguishes each workers by his color (different for each player)

    • setPlayer3Panel

      public void setPlayer3Panel​(java.lang.String god, java.lang.String nickname, boolean playingPlayer, boolean deadPlayer, java.lang.String url_icon)
      Method that set the Player 3 Pane with every detail about it
      Parameters:
      god - god card owned by the player 3
      nickname - nickname of the player 3
      playingPlayer - indicate if the player 3 is the one that is playing the turn
      deadPlayer - indicate if the player 3 is dead or is not playing anymore
      url_icon - Id that distinguishes each workers by his color (different for each player)

    • setPanel3Visibility

      public void setPanel3Visibility​(boolean visibility)
      Method that sets invisible the Player 3 Panel if this is a 2 PLayer match
      Parameters:
      visibility - identify if the match is 2 or 3 Players

    • resetBoardGrid

      public void resetBoardGrid()
      Method that clears the Board (GridPane) and reset the Player Panel every turn

      Method that allows you to launch the next command, based on the phase of the turn played
      Parameters:
      e - Mouse Event that triggers the Method

    • sendCellSelected

      public void sendCellSelected​(java.lang.String cellSelected)
      Method that checks if the current player has Atlas as god, so we can display the correct Pane
      Parameters:
      cellSelected - cell selected by the player for the phase
